support.title: Support Tech Education
support.body: Help us empower the next generation by funding cohorts and resources.

faqs.q: Where does the TechLabs take place?
faqs.a: We run in multiple cities and online. Check the application page for your city.

faqs.q: Is it a full time program?
faqs.a: No. It is designed to fit alongside work or studies (part-time).
